desc: FH Charm 100% Natural Soy Wax Candles draw inspiration from natural and genuine warmth of farmhouse. It hand poured candles in Calgary, Alberta, Canada. It stands it's mission to only use premium and safe ingredients. Hence, all fragrances are par...

layout.text: Farmhouse Charm Candles hand pours 100% soy wax candles in Alberta, Canada. They are dedicated to bring luxury scented products at an affordable price. Each candle is formulated to bring wonderful natural inspired scents that are not overpowering. It features a wooden wick that boost ambiance by creating a crackling sound in each burn. It burns clean as it is paraben free, phthalate free and paraffin free. And with proper care, each candle has at least 50 hours of burn time. So relax, breathe in and enjoy the charming aromas that each candle has to offer!
